name: advanced-authentication
description: Advanced Authentication System with React and Node.js

scripts.dev: concurrently -n "backend,frontend" -c "blue,green" "pnpm --filter back-end run back-end" "pnpm --filter front-end run dev"
scripts.start: concurrently -n "backend,frontend" -c "blue,green" "pnpm --filter back-end run start" "pnpm --filter front-end run dev"
scripts.clean: pnpm --filter front-end exec rm -rf dist && pnpm --filter back-end exec rm -rf dist
scripts.type-check: pnpm --filter front-end run type-check && pnpm --filter back-end run type-check
